title: How do I fix my Assistant?
content: Whenever I ask Assistant "what time do the Braves play" or who plays for them it goes to Google search instead of answering it in the actual assistant as it did before. If I ask it reminders or the height of a building it still answers it in assistant. I tried to replicate this in the Google Assistant app on my iPad and Assistant worked properly.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
